name: The Infinite Grimoire
description:
Game Story Long ago there was a king who was famous for his kindness. But the King was led astray by a stranger who carried a cursed tome. The tome is said to contain the secrets of eternal life and other forms of forbidden magic. The tome was also called "The Infinite Grimoire".  A great battle broke out within the kingdom and as a result, many people died. Knights, town guards, civilians, even the king perished.  After the incident, the traveler who carried the forbidden tome disappeared. Only leaving rumours of his hideout, in a dungeon far, far away.  After years upon years of searching, you find the rumoured dungeon. Search for the tome and escape the dungeon. Some Struggles

This is my first experience making a game to participate in a jam. I had a lot of difficulties because I am also a beginner in the unity engine, but I was able to pass it on the sixth day, i also say thanks to my friends who help me for making this game too. I am happy to have made this game even though the game is very simple and a little messy hehe :D

Dungeon Crawler Jam 2021 #dcjam2021

Game built with Unity.
